entry.data:
CLEAR, COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 9 ABOVE
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE LOWER 50S AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING TO AROUND 50 IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
